name: Portable Battery Program
description: Free portable battery for Medical Baseline or Self-Identified Vulnerable customers who rely on medical devices and experienced PSPS or EPSS outages
fullDescription: PG&E provides free portable backup batteries to customers who depend on electricity for medical equipment and have experienced power shutoffs, ensuring they can maintain critical care during outages.
whatTheyOffer:
- Free portable backup battery
- For Medical Baseline customers
- For Self-Identified Vulnerable customers
- Powers medical devices during outages
- For those who experienced PSPS or EPSS outages
- Battery shipped directly to your home
howToGetIt:
1. Must be enrolled in Medical Baseline program
2. Or registered as Self-Identified Vulnerable customer
3. Must rely on electricity for medical equipment
4. Must have experienced PSPS or EPSS outage
5. Apply through PG&E website or call
6. Battery shipped to your address at no cost
keywords: portable battery, free, PG&E, Medical Baseline, medical equipment, CPAP, oxygen, PSPS, outage, disability
